events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I want to return it for a full refund, please advise on the next steps.
The case has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for a return and refund.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item received.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I am here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have attached pictures of the item that does not match my original purchase.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label for sending back the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund offer. I appreciate how fast you are handling this.
The refund has been processed, and a prepaid label has been emailed to you. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and the return process was smooth. Feel free to contact us anytime.
As you confirmed everything was handled to your satisfaction, we are now closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
